(UNITURN mérőállomás)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_usb_kengyel_rogzito.txt -t)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f900

safetop0.10
safebottom0.10
overcut0.200

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.02

fmax900
fmin500
fratio0.8

z1 = 2
c1 = 0.025 #furatok
c2 = 0.050 #letörések
c3 = 0.100 #keret

offset-111,0,0

x1 = 118.75
x2 = 158.95

x1 = sub($x1, .6)
x2 = add($x2, .6)

(3)
l $x1,0 $x1,6.5 z$z1 c$c2
l $x2,0 $x2,6.5 z$z1 c$c2

l 130.75,6 146.75,6 z$z1 c$c3

b outline 111,0 size55.7,12 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.7,0.7 r0 nl1,1,1,1

(4)
l $x1,14 $x1,20.5 z$z1 c$c2
l $x2,14 $x2,20.5 z$z1 c$c2

l 130.75,20 146.75,20 z$z1 c$c3

b outline 111,14 size55.7,12 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.7,0.7 r0 nl1,1,1,0

(5)
l $x1,28 $x1,34.5 z$z1 c$c2
l $x2,28 $x2,34.5 z$z1 c$c2

l 130.75,34 146.75,34 z$z1 c$c3

b outline 111,28 size55.7,12 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.7,0.7 r0 nl1,1,1,0

(6)
l $x1,42 $x1,48.5 z$z1 c$c2
l $x2,42 $x2,48.5 z$z1 c$c2

l 130.75,48 146.75,48 z$z1 c$c3

b outline 111,42 size55.7,12 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.7,0.7 r0 nl1,1,1,0

(7)
l $x1,56 $x1,62.5 z$z1 c$c2
l $x2,56 $x2,62.5 z$z1 c$c2

l 130.75,62 146.75,62 z$z1 c$c3

b outline 111,56 size55.7,12 z$z1 c$c3 g2,0.7,0.7 r0 nl1,1,1,0
